lead_paragraph: PETERS--Warren, born in Boston, Massachusetts, resided in New York, founder of Four Winds Travel and avid art collector and dealer passed away on March 8, he was 87. He was a generous, friendly man filled with wisdom and supportive in every way. He traveled the world and accomplished many great things. He is survived by a son, Jonathan daughter-in-law Elene, brother Ed, sister-in-law Jane and nieces Laura and Emily. A celebration of his life is being planned. 1/3
